description: Detects when an admin share is mounted using net.exe Author: oscd.community, Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT, Zach Stanford @svch0st, wagga. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Mounted Windows Admin Shares with net.exe
query: (process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*\ use\ * AND process.command_line:*\\\*\\*$*)
